metadata.title: CVE-2021-4057 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in file API in Google Chrome prior to 96.0.4664.93 allowed aremote attacker who had compromised the renderer process to potentiallyexploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
